response.headline: Opal no-code app builder offers visual workflow editor and pre-built templates for free
response.summary: Opal provides a visual workflow editor, access to pre-built templates, ability to remix community apps, app sharing via links, and access to GPT and Gemini models. Jono Catliff offers to DM links to get started with Google resources.
